snippet: Nearly 18 months after an uproar over its decision to withdraw funding to Planned Parenthood, Susan G. Komen for the Cure is still struggling to meet fund-raising and participation goals.
abstract: Nearly 18 months after an uproar over its decision to withdraw funding to Planned Parenthood, Susan G. Komen for the Cure is still struggling to meet fund-raising and participation goals.

headline.main: Komen Breast Cancer Charity Cancels Races in 7 Cities
